name: Frog Water
description:
Frog Water

Art: Simon Brooks

Programming: Adam Proctor

Made during Toronto Global Game Jam 2015 January 23rd-25th

Controls

Use the Arrow keys to control the frog. Up and Down switch lanes, left and right control horizontal movement.

Note: most platforms won't require much horizontal movement. If you're having trouble, try starting the game without moving left or right and let the platform do the work.

Additional Credits

Music:

  • Rezoner: http://opengameart.org/content/happy-arcade-tune

Sound Effects:

  • Quack: http://www.youtube.com/jojikiba
  • Splash: http://www.freesound.org/people/cs272/
  • lilypad: http://www.freesound.org/people/duckduckpony/

Made with Unity 4.6
